topics.body:
You know; I thought of something: 99% of science fiction and fantasy genres are full of bullcrap.  I don't mean that as a the science behind them don't add up, rather I mean how people react to aliens or whatever.

What I mean by this is that if aliens were found out to be real tomorrow the most likely scenario is that is our generation would freak the fuck out but the next generation would accept them and call our generation racist.

Basically what I mean by this if aliens immigrated to Earth our generation would be protesting with, "Illegal aliens took muh job!"
and the next generation in line would be having tentacle sex with them and having inter-species babies to which our generation would be going, "keep humans pure of alien dna".

Same thing with mythological creatures or what have you.

Basically imagine how our world handles race or religion; a lot of countries would be accepting whereas a lot of other countries would have wars over that shit.
